name: S.to TV Night Mode v2
description:
For "s.to" also known as "serienstream.to"

--- TV Night Mode Design. ---
Reduced to minimal design. All you really need is there.
Recommended with registered account (includes watchlist, notifications, removes captchas, etc.)
Removes all useless content (like Sharing menus, like buttons, side navigation windows,...)
Recolored elements.

Perfect for using like "TV Mode" in fullscreen.

Notice: The is one tag which I can only modify correctly with JS Injection. If you know another solution, feel free to start a discussion.

My CSS and JS Injection projects: https://github.com/c0d3d-net/User.Injection.Collection/
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
                 If you use a solution for JS Injection, this is the JS script:

var sml = document.querySelector('small[style="color: #ddd; padding: 8px; display: block; line-height: 1.5; font-size: 14px; text-align: center;"]');
sml.style.padding = "8px 8px 8px 16px";
